## UserInfo interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

UserInfo with user displayName, objectId and preferredUserName.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface UserInfo 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [displayName](./teamsfx.userinfo.displayname.md) | string | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> User Display Name. |
|  [objectId](./teamsfx.userinfo.objectid.md) | string | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> User unique reference within the Azure Active Directory domain. |
|  [preferredUserName](./teamsfx.userinfo.preferredusername.md) | string | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Usually be the email address. |
